description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews venture into an underground civilization and encounter the true creators of earthquakes.
name: Land Beneath the Ground!

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews search for the lost crown of Genghis Kahn.
name: The Lost Crown of Genghis Khan!

description: Uncle Scrooge encounters Flintheart Glomgold for the first time.
name: The Second-richest Duck

description: Scrooge and Donald are hypnotized, living the lives of their ancestors, and search for their treasure.
name: Back To Long Ago!

description: A sales contest leads Uncle Scrooge and Donald Duck to a city of golden roofs in Indochina.
name: City of Golden Roofs

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews discover King Solomon's mines.
name: The Mines of King Solomon

description: Uncle Scrooge buys some native American land.
name: Land of the Pygmy Indians

description: Uncle Scrooge takes a mysterious ball to to the South Pole, followed by a Brutopian rival.
name: A Cold Bargain

description: Uncle Scrooge hides his money from the Beagle Boys.
name: The Money Well

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews discover a river that flows gold.
name: The Golden River

description: Uncle Scrooge and Donald Duck investigate Scrooge's shipwrecks.
name: The Strange Shipwrecks

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews venture to a moon of gold.
name: The Twenty-four Carat Moon

description: The Beagle Boys create a giant lumberjacking machine.
name: The Paul Bunyan Machine

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews encounter a ghostly ship.
name: The Flying Dutchman
Quest Of The Four Talismans, Part 1

description: Uncle Scrooge again competes with Flintheart Glomgold for the title of World's Richest Duck - by turning everything they own into massive piles of silver dollars.
name: The Money Champ

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews discover an ancient letter that leads them to an Incan gold mine.
name: The Prize of Pizarro

description: Uncle Scrooge takes his money into space, where he encounters aliens.
name: Island in the Sky

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews discover the Fountain of Youth.
name: That's No Fable!

description: Uncle Scrooge ships gold and tries to disguise it as corn from the Beagle Boys.
name: All At Sea

description: Uncle Scrooge encounters some Arab ducks while drilling for oil in the Sahara.
name: Pipeline to Danger

description: Uncle Scrooge ventures to the Amazon in search of nutmeg for his favorite tea.
name: A Spicy Tale

description: Uncle Scrooge uses an invincible glass that he uses on his Money Bin.
name: The Unsafe Safe

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews discover the treasure of Ali Baba.
name: Cave of Ali Baba

description: Uncle Scrooge encounters Magica De Spell for the first time.
name: The Midas Touch

description: Uncle Scrooge competes with Gladstone Gander in a prospecting contest.
name: The Golden Nugget Boat

description: Uncle Scrooge and his nephews are taken to a far-off planet.
name: Mythtic Mystery

description: Uncle Scrooge, his nephews and the Beagle Boys all shrink and encounter ants.
name: Billions in the Hole
The Status Seeker
Wispy Willie
A Spicy Tale
Topolino e il problema del due più due
Paperino miliardario al pomodoro
Paperino e l'organizzazione P.
Zio Paperone e il nemico domestico
Paperino e l'acqua-cross di Paperopoli
Moby Duck e il vascello fantasma di Capitan Crook
Per mille dollari d'odore
Topolino e l'Atlantide sommersa
Topolino e l'avventura delle avventure
Super Pippo e gli ipno-trucchi

description: Hunting the Hunters: Vampi climbs the corporate ladder to discover some of the truth behind the Headhunters and their prey. This is a whole new world for Vampi, where people are set in their ways and won't fight back; they're content and Vampi isn't. There's something wrong with their status quo and she's not giving up hope... no matter how much they've lost it.
name: Upward Mobility, Part 2

description: It's the final blowout as Vampi faces the threats of the Headhunters, the trial of the Board of Directors, and the horror of some real corporate bloodsuckers. "Upward Mobility" concludes in a raucous encounter where only the strong will survive!
name: Upward Mobility, Part 3

description: Out on the road again, Vampi is listening to voices that are telling her where to go and where to stick her swords. Those running with her begin to question her sanity... as does Vampi, who is torn between following this new path of vengeance and discovering the truth behind her instigators.
name: Innocent Blood, Part 1

description: Traversing the Los Diablos club scene and finding it in need of some cleaning, Vampi is working her way through those in charge and, assisted by the mysterious Monique, cleaning house. It's only when she discovers the double-cross that things go completely out of control. Not everything can be solved by the pointy end of a sword, but Vampi is sure going to try to fix things that way!
name: Innocent Blood, Part 2
Hurricane Castle

description: The teenaged Pug dreams of being a solider along with his friend Tomas, but as the day of choosing comes and goes, Pug finds himself apprenticed instead to the magician Kulgan, who sees promise in the boy despite his inability to control the magical powers welling up within him. As the boys grow older and more confident in their trades, Pug finds himself smitten with the Castle Crydee's Princess Carline. But will he be ready when an opportunity arises to protect her from great danger?

name: The Money Champ
Paperino e gli scherzi di carnevale
Zio Paperone e i germogli esplosivi

description: The magician's apprentice Pug has struggled for months with his inability to harness the magical energies inside him. But when a riding session with the Princess Carline becomes a dangerous adventure, Pug discovers that his power is more than enough to save the day. But as Pug is honored for his heroism, a sign that things are about to change forever arrives on the shores of Crydee...

name: Topolino e la base orbitale
Zio Paperone e il segreto di Villa Mistero
Zio Paperone e la psicosi dell'oro

description: The Riftwar has begun! Pug and Tomas have discovered the wreckage of a strange ship from another world, and a dying captive offers information about the Tsurani, the mysterious invaders who have been secretly scouting the world of Midkemia. The court of Crydee is sobered by this revelation, and prepares for battle immediately. But can they warn the rest of the kingdom before the invasion occurs?

Magician apprentice Pug may have lost his mentor as Kulgan, the Master Magician of Crydee, lies wounded by a strange attack from the Tsurani invaders. But more exciting events are about to unfold as Queen Aglaranna and her delegation from Elvandar arrive to discuss the Tsurani threat. Can the elves and the people of Crydee find a way to repel these invaders before they storm into the world of Midkemia... or will they have to send for the distant king's aid as they prepare for all-out war?

Pug and Tomas travel with a party sent to Elvandar to consult the elven queen about the invading Tsurani. But their path is fraught with peril, and they'll have other problems along the way, like raiding parties from the moredhel, better known as the Brotherhood of the Dark Path.

The journey from Crydee to Krondor is wrought with peril, and an ambush by the dark elves known as the Moredhel has decimated Duke Borric's company of men. With the help of the Dwarven Chief Dolgan, what remains of the party must travel through the mines of Mac Mordian Cadal to find a new path to their destination. But the mines are anything but safe, and Tomas will discover something in them that will change his own path forever...

As Tomas fights for his life alone in the ancient Dwarven mines, the magician's apprentice, Pug, finds himself and Duke Boric's traveling party shipwrecked upon the shore of the mysterious Sorcerer's Isle. Which just so happens to be the legendary island home to the fearsome sorcerer Macros the Black. What impact will the strange messages of the Traveler have upon Pug and the fate of all Midkemia?

Political schemes abound as the kingdom teeters on the brink of Tsurani invasion. Duke Borric's expedition discovers that all is not well at the royal palace of Prince Erland of Krondor. Tomas has been abandoned to face the life-draining menace of a fearsome wraith on his own. And in the ancient mines of Mac Mordain, Cadal Dolgan, the Dwarven chieftain, and his mighty battleaxe return to face off against the ancient power of Rhuagh, the great golden dragon. Meanwhile, Pug encounters an intriguing new princess.

Tomas and Dolgan fight for their lives! The pair quickly realize there is far more to Rhuagh's final gifts than either of them first thought. Meanwhile in Salador, Pug and Duke Borric's party learn from Lord Kerus that treachery has taken root in the kingdom, and civil war may soon follow.

The Eve of the Riftwar is here! Pug and the ducal party at last fulfill their desperate quest and arrive at the Kingdom's capital city of Rillanon. But the unease and growing tension of their long journey culminates in frustration as King Rodric the 4th reveals himself as a sovereign unhinged, plagued by indecisiveness and terrifying personality shifts. Treachery abounds, and not all is as it appears to be. As Duke Borric contemplates treason against the crown, the Riftwar finally erupts as the mighty Tsurani Empire begin their conquest of Midkemia.

name: Topolino e i predoni vichinghi
Paperino e i nipotini protestatari
Paperino e il miliardario nostalgico
Paperino pilota di linea

description: Fifteen years in the making, Bongo Comics Group presents the first multiple-title crossover since 1994's "When Bongos Collide!" Witness the event series that will change Radioactive Man, Bart Simpson, and the citizens of Springfield's lives forever. It's a three-part tale told in three consecutive weeks that will reinvent summer crossovers and comic storytelling, as we know it! It's "The Great, Extreme, Ultimate, and Totally Awesome Radioactive Man Event!" In Part 1, the new publisher of Radioactive Man comics, Krusty the Clown, is looking for a new marketing ploy to reinvigorate the character and bring in new readers; however, rumors of changes to the iconic irradiated crusader set the townsfolk abuzz. Is it time to form an angry mob or to form a line at the Android's Dungeon?
name: The Best Radioactive Man Event Ever, Part 1

description:
GROUND ZERO. The future is now. And now belongs to VAMPI!!

Many elements of the original will be apparent, but Vampi's been transported to a world that today's readers will find frightening-and exciting-for a whole new set of reasons.

Vampi is a young, modern take on Vampirella and in this slick, sharp and rich first issue we get the setup for our heroines new back-story and search for a cute to the infection that is much a curse as a blessing.
name: Switchblade Kiss, Part One

description: The mystery is revealed! At last the secret behind Vampi's mission is uncovered in Dark Angel Rising Part 2. What possible power could the ladder have to send Vampi on her blood-soaked quest? The answer lies with the deadly Archangel!
name: Dark Angel Rising, Part Two

description: Kevin Lau continues to defy expectations, taking Vampi into the 21st century! Following her explosive debut, Vampi descends further into the heart of darkness in search of the elusive and mysterious Ladder. What is the "Ladder," and why is it so crucial that Vampi retrieve it? The enigmatic Archangel who controls the Ladder will stop at nothing to keep it! The mystery deepens.
name: Switchblade Kiss, Part Two

description: It's a mere three issues into the hot new "re-vamped" series, and already the stage is set for a bloodbath that will alter the course of Vampi's life! With the mysterious Ladder within her reach, Vampi moves closer not only to her goal, but to the ultimate confrontation with the deadly Archangel as well!
name: Switchblade Kiss, Part Three

description: Now with her goal, the mysterious "Ladder", in plain sight, within her grasp, Vampi must face and overcome her most lethal adversary yet. She uncovers the shocking and disturbing face of a new kind of villain, the sinister Archangel! Dark Angel Rising, a three issue arc beginning with Vampi #4. KEVIN LAU continues to defy expectations as hetransforms Vampi into the definitive new heroine for the 21st Century!
name: Dark Angel Rising, Part One

description: Unarmed and defenseless - scarcely having recovered from Archangel's savage beating = Vampi is in for the rematch of her life against Shockrock and Deadbolt! Her only hope is her mysterious allies. But will even their help be enough? "Dark Angel Rising," Vampi's second major story arc, reaches its dramatic, violent conclusion in the most exciting issue yet!
name: Dark Angel Rising, Part Three

description: Recovered from the last attempt on her life, Vampi must plunge once more into the heart of darkness to challenge a nightmare world of savagery, degradation, and systematic slaughter that threatens to engulf the entire world. Featuring a new hi-tech costume and a deadly array of devastating weapons at her disposal, Vampi stars in Underworld Part 1.
name: Underworld, Part One

description: Welcome to the Meat Boutique, a cathedral of sleaze and corruption where all tastes are catered for, and no act of depravity is taboo. Vampi must enter this citadel of sin and confront Archangel's female sidekick, the sadistic Endura.
name: Underworld, Part Two

description: The countdown to Vampi's year-end spectacular has begun! Vampi reverts to a merciless killer, unhindered by conscience or compassion, and abandons her mission to find the cure for vampirisim! Crazed with a renewed lust for blood and revenge against her former allies, Vampi is now driven by a single purpose: to kill Jacob - and anyone else that gets in her way!
name: Tainted Love, Part One

description: It's payback time. Vampi has beaten the drug that transformed her into a blood-crazed killer. And now she's really out for blood, Endura's. But does she realize that Endura's ability to channel and metabolize pain makes her practically unbeatable? And, while Vampi fights for her life, the real traitor in Jacob's midst finally plays his hand, exposing the full extent of Archangel's conspiracy and its deadly consequences for Vampi, Jacob and their allies. All this and the year end spectacular is only an issue away! Written by DAVID CONWAY, artwork by KEVIN LAU. Regular cover by Kevin Lau, Limited Edition cover by JASON PEARSON.
name: Tainted Love, Part Two

description: The final showdown! Kevin Lau's modern-day manga classic finishes its first year with this explosive issue. The elusive ladder -- the cure that Vampi has killed so many for -- is finally within her grasp. And only Endura stands in her way to getting it.
name: Tainted Love, Part Three

description: It's Robin's birthday party, and you're invited! See what the Tiny Titans get him for the big day. Plus, Cyborg learns what continuity is and why sometimes it works against you. And join Mrs. Atom, Dot and Crumb for a day of shopping.
name: Raven's Book of Magic Spells

description: Anarchy, lawlessness, and chaos. Society is trembling on the brink of the abyss as violence, blood lust, and murder sweep across the country, transforming its cities into grisly panoramas of hell. Vampi's desperate fight for survival in a world more deadly and dangerous than anything she's previously encountered begins in "Hi-Rise," the first installment of Anarchy in the USA. This three-part story arc, beginning in Vampi #13, kicks off the second year of the ongoing saga, which sees Kevin Lau's critically and fan acclaimed interpretation of comics' original bad girl scale radical new heights.
name: Anarchy in the USA, Part One

description: Framed for the murder of an innocent girl, Vampi finds herself isolated in a world teetering on the brink of chaos. Her only chance to exonerate herself and locate Ladder, is to follow a macabre clue left at the murder scene. Following the trail leads Vampi to the deadly world of Neverland, and a formidable new adversary even she had not anticipated!
name: Anarchy in the USA, Part Two

description: The hunter becomes the hunted. Vampi comes face-to-face with her most deadly Foe - Xenocyde. Following a trail she believes will lead her to Archangel's lair, Vampi unwittingly takes the bait designed to lure her into a deadly trap. Now she must confront an assassin who has studied her every strategy and tactic and can anticipate her every move.
name: Anarchy in the USA, Part Three
Ponygirl Competition

description: By Roland Cordell/Peter Noga Jr.; Lord of a hidden island lair, the erudite and sadistic Lord Farris gives a prospective slavebuyer a tour of the facilities, where he trains his female slaves in an astounding variety of some of the harshest S/M scenes ever put to paper!

Russ Manning Award winner Tan Eng Huat (GHOST RIDER, SILVER SURFER) joins critically acclaimed writer Rick Remender (Fear Agent) in chronicling Frank Castle’s war against Osborn’s Cabal as the corrosive affects of their “Dark Reign” further degenerates the Marvel Universe. The Hood’s crime organization has infected the entire world, and nowhere is it more prevalent than the street of New York where, hidden within the decaying husks of abandoned buildings, the Hood has built his secret empire out of everyone’s sight… including Norman Osborn’s. The Punisher is the one man standing between the new kingpin of crime and total domination, but in order to save his city from the decay and corruption, Frank Castle will first have to survive the rage of-- THE DEADLY DOZEN!
name: Dead End Part One
First Night of Six
Second Night of Six
Third Night of Six
Fourth Night of Six
Last Night of Six
